content:
For tonight/tomorrow meeting: https://bit.ly/3hDnGXz

2020/08/27 Backdrop CMS LIVE - Planning meeting
Backdrop CMS Live planning meeting agenda - @todo Todayâ€™s agenda: https://bit.ly/3hDnGXz | Zoom link: http://bit.ly/backdrop-meetings Meeting Time (in your local time zone): https://bit.ly/2EEyGp2 Introductions What is your name? Where are you from? If you want, a quick non-agenda ite...
@jenlampton Are you awake? Did you forget us?
Why not record everything, but then only upload certain ones with approval, etc.?
@BWPanda - We tested and it appears that the minimum donation is $1 for registration.
But, if anyone contacts us and asks for free registration, we will accommodate them.
Thanks @Olaf Grabienski, @BWPanda, and @klonos for attending the meeting. Is this a good time for any of you to meet in the future or not?
Yes. When I'm not as busy with work I can take time off and participate more. I don't mind a bit earlier either though.
Yeah, but it was 8:00am in Central Europe, so earlier is not good for them.
At least, it would not be good for me if I lived in Central Europe.
Thanks for asking! Well, not really good (as you noticed, I got distracted a couple of times). Two or three hours later would be better, or even one hour, if that works for everybody.
Hm, a bit earlier vs. a bit later ;-) Hard to find a good time slot!
Well, I'm willing to do a 2:00am meeting, but I'm not sure who else is on this side of the Atlantic.
That doesn't work for me, but then you shouldn't worry about me if it suits others better. 5-8pm is dinner/family time for me.
